WorkflowInfo.Name: Create anti-virus inventory report
WorkflowInfo.Description: Check if anti virus is installed on a list of servers
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetInstalledSoftware;Assembly=GetInstalledSoftware, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="3" TableName="Servers" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="Server" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Status" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <Server>Server1</Server>
 <Status />
 <Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>

 <Status />
 <Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <Server>Server3</Server>

 <Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <Server>192.168.1.1</Server>
 <Status />
 <Version />
 </resultSet>

TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns4:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%TotalServers%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%Servers%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="Servers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns6:GetInstalledSoftware IsValid="True" x:Name="getInstalledSoftware1" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Get Installed Software" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get the list of installed software on the specified host" HostId="-2" TypeName="GetInstalledSoftware" UserName="" /> <ns7:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="virus" ResultSet="%getInstalledSoftware1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="getInstalledSoftware1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%getRows1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="getRows1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="check_process_count"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="AVInstalled"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 0" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns9:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="Installed" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%Servers%" x:Name="SetStatus1" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="GetVersion" ColumnNumber="6" ResultSet="%getRows1%" RowNumber="1" ResultSetName="getRows1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns9:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%GetVersion%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%Servers%" x:Name="setCellValue1" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="AVNotInstalled"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="DefaultBranch" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns9:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="Not Installed" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%Servers%" x:Name="SetStatus2" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns2:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%Servers%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /> <ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Report: Anti Virus Inventory" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="SendReport" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>

face=Calibri>%convertToHTMLTable1%</FONT> </BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of servers from an Excel file or a memory table and checks if Anti-Virus software is installed on each server. Each time the software is found installed on a server, the servers name is added to a list held in a memory table, and at the end of the process this list is being sent to the relevant personnel. This process can be scheduled to run daily, and will help you make sure all your servers are protected with the latest version of Anti-Virus.
